meanings.definition: Promoting or enhancing the secretion of milk.
meanings.sent1: The lactogenic tea helped the new mother produce more milk for her baby.
meanings.sent2: The lactogenic properties of certain foods can aid in breastfeeding.
meanings.sent3: The lactogenic smoothie made the cow produce so much milk, it started a dairy farm!
meanings.sent4: Her nurturing presence had a lactogenic effect on the team, inspiring productivity.
meanings.sent5: The lactogenic power of her words filled the room with a sense of warmth and comfort.

meanings.definition: A substance that promotes the secretion of milk.
meanings.sent1: The herbal supplement acted as a lactogenic, increasing milk supply for the nursing mother.
meanings.sent2: Farmers often use lactogenics to boost milk production in dairy cows.
meanings.sent3: The lactogenic powder was so effective that even the kittens started producing milk!
meanings.sent4: In the world of dairy farming, lactogenics play a crucial role in maximizing output.
meanings.sent5: The lactogenic added to the animal feed resulted in a significant increase in milk yield.
